title: beefs-diceware-wordlists
blurb: High-quality, multilingual Diceware wordlists with profanity filters, entropy checks, normalized glyphs, and reproducible build scripts.
description: A curated family of Diceware wordlists intended for secure, memorable passphrases. Lists are language-aware, profanity-screened, accent-normalized, and de-duplicated by edit distance. Each release includes reproducible build instructions from public corpora, 5Ã—d6 mappings, checksum manifests, and optional wallet-friendly compact indices.
